titleStmt.title: VVar and peace reconciled, or, A discourse of constancy in inconstant times containing matter of direction and consolation against publick calamities / written originally in a foreign language and translated for the benefit of the gentrie of this nation.
De constantia. English
titleStmt.author: Lipsius, Justus, 1547-1606.
Wanley, Nathaniel, 1634-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: This translation of De constantia appeared in 1670 under title: A discourse of constancy.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
